fee_codes.conditions: Rendered same patient same day same physician as any other consultation or visit except P003 and P004 is an insured service payable at nil.

fee_codes.units: Minimum of 20 minutes in direct contact with the patient.
fee_codes.conditions: The service is eligible for payment only if start and stop times of the service are recorded in the patient's permanent medical record.

fee_codes.description: Medical management of early pregnancy - initial service
fee_codes.conditions: The cost of the drug(s) is not included in the fee for the service.

fee_codes.description: Medical management of ectopic pregnancy - initial service
fee_codes.conditions: The cost of the drug(s) is not included in the fee for the service.

fee_codes.description: Medical management of early or ectopic pregnancy - follow-up visit
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to two per patient per pregnancy. Services in excess of this limit will be adjusted to another assessment fee.

fee_codes.description: Medical management of non-viable fetus or intra-uterine fetal demise between 14 and 20 weeks gestation
fee_codes.conditions: Only eligible for payment if the length of gestation is confirmed by ultrasound.

referenced_codes.description: Rendered same patient same day same physician as any other consultation or visit except P003 and P004.

Services described as consultations, assessments or counselling (and those procedures that are generally accepted components of this service) are not eligible for payment when rendered the same day to the same patient by the same physician as A920.

Services described as consultations, assessments or counselling (and those procedures that are generally accepted components of this service) are not eligible for payment when rendered the same day to the same patient by the same physician as A922.

Services described as consultations, assessments or counselling (and those procedures that are generally accepted components of this service) are not eligible for payment when rendered the same day to the same patient by the same physician as A921.

referenced_codes.context: eligible for payment in addition to
referenced_codes.description: If uterine curettage is required for postpartum hemorrhage due to retained products.
